game.name: Gowf: A Golf Adventure
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Gowf is an arcade-style golf game featuring an adventure RPG mode and 8 player online multiplayer. Customize your character, level up gear and skills, and take on friends in a variety of courses and game modes!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Gowf is an arcade-style golf game featuring an adventure RPG mode and 8 player online multiplayer. Customize your character, level up gear and skills, and take on friends in a variety of courses and game modes!
